'''Fauna Friends''' is a [[skin pack]] that includes 36 skins themed around animals. It is available through a promo code obtained by purchasing an eligible, ''Minecraft'' themed product at ''Walmart'' between June 24, 2024 and August 24, 2024. The promo codes were redeemable until February 28, 2025.<ref>{{Cite|url=https://www.walmart.com/cp/minecraft-promo/1685719|title=Minecraft Promo|website=Walmart.com}}</ref>
